about_the_game:
In VR, you can become a woman and experience masturbation with all sorts of toys.
Change your body however you like with customizable physiques, costumes, and hairstyles.
It awakens an incredible sensation and you will feel as if you are actually being stimulated.
You can enjoy the feeling of climaxing with the VR sensation and phantom sensation.


Game Explanation:
With 6DoF compatibility, you can move around freely in the VR space.
You can use multiple sex toys such as vibrators and dildos.
This game implements realistic actions such as penetration, squeezing between breasts, and sucking with your mouth.

User Guide:
You can change clothing, sizes, and hairstyle by touching the cube.
Get into a naughty pose by lowering your stance to crouch down.
You can feel the breasts vividly and enjoy a realistic, immersive experience as if you were truly a woman.


Characters depicted in this game are 18 years of age or older.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
